@Redo You're an idiot. It's pretty clear she's NOT happy with him. He's using her...she's his plaything and source of money(he's her pimp and porn agent), why would he drop her? He doesn't actually lover her or she him. It's purely sex based...which is why she's so sad at the end...she's morally despondent. Learn to read better and pick up the subtleties or something.

Most recognise NTR when they see it. Here, it says NTR on the first page and published as a netorare doujinshi, but some cucks still be in denial over semantics \_(ツ)_/

The NTR in the title stands for netorare, which translates to "cheating" in Japanese. She was never in a relationship with the kid so how is it NTR?  If it is because he has a crush on her or because she is a child hood friend then didn't damn near every guy go thro some kind of NTR in high school for a girl we were to scared to confess to?  Hell, like I said before, the only kind of NTR in the story happened to the blonde dude since he was "with" her first and had her taken away by his boss, but then again he was already sharing her with friends.
The final page was just satisfying
At this point, I think that some people are either in denial about what NTR is or trolling. Agree to disagree.
This is not NTR im disappointed

I still don't think this is NTR.  She wasn't with the little guy at all and just saw him as a friend at best, if anything it was his fault for not confessing to her and try earlier.  She didn't cheat on him and ended up with the blond dude, if anything, he was the victim of the NTR and not the little guy.
This is good NTR. The last two pages were left untranslated but I think the revenge will be left up to the reader's imagination.
